name: Universal Mute
author: fidele007
description:
A simple tweak which mutes the media volume when the ringer is muted.

Configure options in Settings.

1.0-1: Added preset media volume in Settings
1.0-6: Made use of IOHIDEventRef for Ringer Mute
1.0-7: Universal Mute now works with Ringer flipswitch
1.1.2 (2017/04/15): Disable media volume mute on SpringBoard start if audio is playing (compatibility with Don't Stop the Party!)
